instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Manrope' font for headings and 'IBM Plex Sans' for body by importing them from Google Fonts in index.css.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all code blocks and token metrics.
Ensure the Theme Toggle works correctly and persists state.
The 'Arena' must be the focal point. Use the split-screen layout defined in layout_strategy.
Use 'recharts' for the metrics dashboard. Style the charts to match the theme (minimal axes, custom tooltips).
For the 'Traditional Agent' panel, simulate 'context accumulation' by showing a growing progress bar and a list of previous context items that gets longer.
For the 'Ralph Loop Agent' panel, show the context bar resetting or staying low, emphasizing the 'fresh context' concept.
Use 'framer-motion' for smooth transitions when new iterations appear.
The 'Control Panel' should be floating at the bottom, inspired by macOS dock or linear.app controls.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' aesthetics. No default centered layouts.
Dark mode should be deep and rich, not just grey.
Light mode should be crisp and high-contrast.
Micro-interactions on every button and card hover.
